channel.title: Location-rsses on Software Architecture Forum: A Self-Organizing Open Spaces Conference in Crested Butte, Colorado Aug 27-31, 2018
channel.description: Recent content in Location-rsses on Software Architecture Forum: A Self-Organizing Open Spaces Conference in Crested Butte, Colorado Aug 27-31, 2018

item.title: Location
item.description:
Crested Butte is a small resort town located at about 9000 feet, near the continental divide. It is known for its skiing in the winter and hiking and mountain biking in the summer.

  • The Gunnison/Crested Butte Promotional Site
  • Visit Crested Butte
  • Travel Crested Butte
  • Downtown Crested Butte
  • Colorado Tourism Site
  • Ski CB (Also has summer information, but focused on Mount CB)

  • Wikipedia

  • Photos 1

  • Photos 2

Although free buses run up to the ski mountain every 15 minutes (so you can find lodging there), we hold the event in downtown Crested Butte. People generally have a better time staying downtown (The Town of Crested Butte) and not on the mountain (The Town of MOUNT Crested Butte). This way, you can just walk everywhere.

Internet is available in the conference location and at several locations within easy walking distance of the conference location.

Restaurants: This is a reasonably accurate list.
